backend/lib/Notification.mo: Defines notification types and a Notification record including metadata, read status, and optional IMEI association.
backend/lib/Statistics.mo: Defines data structures for overall statistics, monthly report counts, and phone status breakdowns.
backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining phone, user, report, notification, invite, PIN, and ownership data structures plus core storage and authorization logic.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries with associated files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files and their roles in the application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring meta tags, PWA settings, and loading the React root script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component handling authentication, activation, profile setup gating, and rendering routed content via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/ActivationPendin: UI screen shown to authenticated but inactive users with instructions, principal copy, and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/ImeiHistoryTimel: Renders a timeline of IMEI events with icons, labels, timestamps, and loading skeletons. Computes hand-off counts and formats event display using UI components.
frontend/src/components/InviteGate.tsx: Empty placeholder component with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSwitcher: Provides a dropdown button to switch between Indonesian and English using the app’s i18n system.
frontend/src/components/MainLayout.tsx: Defines the main application layout with header, content area, bottom navigation tabs, and optional admin tab. Integrates notifications, identity hooks, and language switching.
frontend/src/components/NotificationPopu: Displays a popup notification with type‑based styling and auto‑dismiss behavior. Shows an icon, title, message, optional IMEI, and close button.
frontend/src/components/PinSettingsDialo: Modal dialog for setting or changing a 4‑digit PIN with validation and mutation handling. Supports current PIN entry when changing an existing PIN.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Full‑screen modal to collect and save user profile info (name, email, city) with form validation and loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity, initializing access control and invalidating related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication and login state using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actors, covering access state, user profiles, activation, PIN checks, and related mutations.
frontend/src/i18n/index.ts: Implements a simple i18n system with language management, resource storage, subscriptions, and Indonesian translations.
frontend/src/i18n/locales/en.json: English translation resource file containing UI text for login, tabs, about section, and other app features.
frontend/src/i18n/locales/id.json: Indonesian translation resource file mirroring English keys for UI text and app content.
frontend/src/i18n/useTranslation.ts: React hook providing access to translation functions and language switching with automatic re-render on language change.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme variables, base theming, and custom scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an about page with translated content explaining purpose and blockchain benefits using styled UI components.
frontend/src/pages/AdminInviteManagement: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminUserActivationPa: Provides UI for admins to validate a Principal ID and activate a user via mutation hook.
frontend/src/pages/CheckImeiPage.tsx: Allows users to check an IMEI’s status and view its history, showing different result cards based on phone status.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays statistics and recent theft reports using data from backend hooks with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides a login screen using Internet Identity with feature descriptions and translation support.
frontend/src/pages/MyPhonesPage.tsx: Manages listing, adding, and releasing user phones with PIN and activation checks, using dialogs for registration and release actions.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Displays a 404 page with an error icon and a button to return home.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays notifications with icons, timestamps, and controls to mark items as read.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows user profile details, account activation status, and PIN settings with logout support.
frontend/src/pages/ReportFoundPage.tsx: Provides a form to report a found phone by IMEI and optional finder information.
frontend/src/pages/ReportLostPage.tsx: Allows users to report a phone as lost or stolen, including location retrieval and details submission.
frontend/src/pages/StatisticsPage.tsx: React page that fetches and displays statistics with loading skeletons, error handling, summary cards, and charts.
frontend/src/router.tsx: Defines the TanStack React Router route tree, mapping all app pages under MainLayout and exporting the configured router.
frontend/src/utils/releaseOwnershipError: Provides helpers to convert various backend or thrown errors into clean, user‑friendly messages for phone ownership release failures.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending themes, colors, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: JSON file describing current project state, architectural notes, known issues, and pending feature requests.
